episodes_names: Episode 1 - Flowers are in Full Bloom! Koi Koi Sevens Love is in Full Throttle
Episode 2 - Bravo, Girls! Rocked and Drifted! Watch Miyas Counterattack!
Episode 3 - Special Effects Are On Fire! Beyond Akiwos Heart...What?
Episode 4 - Beautiful Flowers Are Soon Picked! What Is Otomeis Daydream?
Episode 5 - Splendides! Concours De Beaute, Traansperce Le Ciel D'Odaiba!
Episode 6 - Hot-Blooded Fighting Spirit! Pitiless Sergeant! Work Like a Devil, Sakuya!
Episode 7 - Storm of White Lilies! Ah! My Sweet Darling, I Think of You Wherever You Are!
Episode 8 - The Goddess Awakens!? Light and Darkness of Yayoi Asuka
Episode 9 - Advent of a Little Girl! First Outing of Gantai, the Resurrected Girl.
Episode 10 - Sigh of Love Sick!? Hifumi Is in High Mood! It is a Transient Day of Love!
Episode 11 - A Gorgeous Party!? Miya Explodes! Showdown at the Sand Castle.
Episode 12 - A Sensational Incident! What Do Two of You Cry Out in the Center of World!
Episode 13 - Tropical Paradise!? Fight With Naked Bodies! the Decisive Battle Field Is Tora Tora Tora
